translated: In accordance with the True Idea, the opposite, the Triad, the text on the conditions in the Triad
The triad beginning with “cognizable by some”

original: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.🔽Kenaci viññeyyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kenacid viññeyyam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na kenacid viññeyyaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe avigate nava  kenacid viññeyyam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na kenacid viññeyyaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
translated: With a wholesome idea cognizable by some as the condition, there arises an unwholesome idea not cognizable by some as the effect-condition. … With a cause as condition, there are nine. … With an absence as condition, there are nine.🔽With a wholesome idea cognizable by some as the condition, there arises a neither-unwholesome-nor-lovely idea not cognizable by some as the effect-condition. … With a cause as condition, there are nine. … With an absence as condition, there are nine.

original: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nakenaci viññeyyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kenaci viññeyyam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na kenaci viññeyyaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
translated: With a neither-unwholesome-nor-lovely idea cognizable by some as the condition, there arises a neither-unwholesome-nor-lovely idea not cognizable by some as the effect-condition. … With a cause as condition, there are nine. … With an absence as condition, there are nine.
